text: Hi guys, does somebody created something like the smart content but outside the HubSpot CMS?, i'd like to know if i can take advantage of the HubSpot api to pull visitor data and switch content based on some criteria

You can either a) embed a smart CTA or b) use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_contact_by_utk> endpoint to get a contact by their cookie and then you can determine what they should be seeing.  It has to be done server-side before the page loads since we donâ€™t support AJAX (unless you want to proxy things through)
basically the answer is no, but it can technically be done if you really want to

:point_up_2: What Zack said... :slightly_smiling_face: (thanks <@UFBNA9K9A>)

That said, help me understand <@UJZ3QF9CH> - where did you want to incorporate smart content?
